# dataRepresentation

**Instance Property**

Returns the PDF data (that is, a PDF document) representing this page. This method does not preserve external page links.

## Declaration

```swift
var dataRepresentation: Data? { get }
```

## Instance Properties

- **pageRef**
title: dataRepresentation
